Author: mountaindrifter#4595
Content: It all depends on what you are referring to really. The more pools there are, the more likely a single pool failing won't cause huge fluctuations in the total net hash and block rate. The  more pools that run different software, teh less likely the network is affected by a single common bug. There is greater security  with fewer pools as large amounts of hash could not be used by a "bad actor". As jl777c said, no single mining source over 50%, but the best security would be if getting any large majority of hash power to one instance was increasingly difficult.  Having more solo miners increses the chance that altered software is not being mined to.  As of today, the owner of pirate.komodostats.com could direct the majority of  PIRATES hash rate however they plese

Author: mountaindrifter#4595
Content: If you took network connections and software efficiency out of the picture, if it takes you on average 1 day to find a block solo, it should take 1 day of earning on a pool to equal a block,  If you are on a pool that finds 10 blocks in a day, you are probably getting 1/10 of each block. If you are on a pool that finds 100 blocks in a day you are probably getting 1/100 of  each block. It feels like less, but it is the same in the end

Author: mountaindrifter#4595
Content: webworker, you are right that the % does not change as time goes. When you flip a quarter the % stays the same. It is always 50% because the quarter has no idea what happened last and is not affected by it. We deal with probabilities here in mining.  When you flip a quarter once it is a 1:2 that you will get heads. It is a 1:1000000 chance you will flip heads 20 times

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you assume that conscious thought cant affect the brownian motion of the air molecules to change the probabilities of heads vs tails

Author: mountaindrifter#4595
Content: if your example is 1% of the net solves, and you got 0 of the last 100 blocks, you still only have 1% likelihood at the 101st, only it is more probable over time that you will get 1%.. The more time there is, the more accurate the numbers will be
